fields.description:
h5.Description 

The Windows build help output could do with some love, it has some dupe options that could be hidden I think, it is missing some helpful items like {{--skipInstallDependencies}} and the text for two options looks messed up (product guid opts)
fields.summary: Windows: Clean up the Windows help output
